sense.def:
The manner
je postopek, ki ga človek uporabi, ko nekaj dela.

seg.quote: They filed the report in a routine manner.
Their manner of rearing their young is extremely unusual.

sense.def:
Človek, ki ima
good manners
, se vede in govori zelo vljudno.

All manner of things
pomeni najrazličnejše stvari.

seg.quote: There were four canvas bags filled with all manner of tools.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
in a manner of speaking
opozorimo, da to, kar smo pravkar rekli, ni povsem ali dobesedno res, pač pa bolj v splošnem smislu.

seg.quote: If he hadn't been her boss, in a manner of speaking, she would have reported him to the police.
